alert.note: Alert for Eastern Juab, Millard Counties; Southwest Utah; Utah Valley (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 30 at 3:23PM MST until January 01 at 5:00AM MST by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 5 AM MST SATURDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 3 to 6 inches, with locally higher amounts along the benches. * WHERE...Utah Valley, Eastern Juab/Millard Counties and Southwest Utah. * WHEN...From 5 PM today to 5 AM MST Saturday. * IMPACTS...Winter driving conditions, including snow packed roads and reduced visibilities, can be expected at times through Friday evening.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. For graphical depictions of the snowfall forecast, including Official NWS Forecast, High End Amount, and Low End Amount, visit weather.gov/slc/winter. For winter road conditions from the Utah Department of Transportation, visit http://www.udottraffic.utah.gov/roadweatherforecast.aspx or dial 511.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Juab, Millard Counties; Southwest Utah; Utah Valley
